Keywords: The Fight for the Polytechnic Schools is the Fight for the Five-Year Plan
and for a Communist Education of the body politic
Title: Bor’ba za politekhnicheskuiu shkolu est’ bor’ba za piatiletku, za kadry, za klassovoe kommunisticheskoe vospitanie (The struggle for the polytechnical school is the struggle, for the Five-Year Plan, for the Communist education about class consciousness)
